name: Dagon
description:
A visual novel adaptation of the horror short story by H.P. Lovecraft. The story is in its original text, with no edits.

A man becomes stranded on a strange land and makes a disturbing discovery of an ancient evil.

This H.P. Lovecraft story is in public domain in the United States and in many other places across the world. Please make sure that it is in public domain in your country before downloading.
